title: Sora 2 System Card
optimized_headline: Discover the Features of the New Sora 2 System Card
raw_excerpt: Sora 2 is our new state of the art video and audio generation model. Building on the foundation of Sora, this new model introduces capabilities that have been difficult for prior video models to achieve– such as more accurate physics, sharper realism, synchronized audio, enhanced steerability, and an expanded stylistic range.

Building on the foundation of Sora, this new model introduces capabilities that have been difficult for prior video models to achieve– such as more accurate physics, sharper realism, synchronized audio, enhanced steerability, and an expanded stylistic range.
speedrun: The Sora 2 model has been unveiled as a cutting-edge video and audio generation tool. It enhances the original Sora with features like improved physics accuracy, sharper realism, synchronized audio, and greater stylistic flexibility. These advancements could significantly change how creators produce content, making it easier to achieve high-quality results. This matters now as demand for sophisticated media generation continues to grow across various industries.
why_it_matters: Content creators can now produce more realistic and engaging videos, improving audience engagement through better quality. This could lead to increased opportunities in fields like entertainment and marketing.
The introduction of Sora 2 indicates a shift towards more advanced AI tools in media, potentially reshaping content production standards and increasing competition among developers.

lenses.eli12: Sora 2 is like upgrading from a basic camera to a high-end one that captures every detail. It helps creators make videos that look and sound amazing, which could make stories more captivating. This matters to everyone because better content can enhance our entertainment experiences.
lenses.pm: For product managers or founders, Sora 2 addresses the need for high-quality content creation tools. Its efficiency in generating realistic media could lower production costs and time. This means teams can focus on creativity rather than technical limitations.
lenses.engineer: Sora 2 builds on its predecessor with significant improvements in physics modeling and audio synchronization. It emphasizes sharper realism and enhanced steerability, making it easier for developers to create tailored content. These advancements could set new benchmarks for video generation models.
